tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrainingData (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT REFERENCES NeuralNetworkModels(model_id),
    training_set JSONB NOT NULL,
    validation_set JSONB NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
CREATE TABLE training_data (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  data JSONB NOT NULL,  label VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE model_parameters (  model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),  learning_rate FLOAT NOT NULL,  layers INTEGER NOT NULL,  epoch INTEGER NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE model_logs (  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,  model_id UUID REFERENCES model_parameters(model_id),  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,  loss FLOAT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE TrainingData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    input_data VARCHAR(255),
    target_data VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE NeuralNetworkModels (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    layers INT,
    accuracy FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    training_time INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES NeuralNetworkModels(model_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Hyperparameters (
    hyperparam_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES NeuralNetworkModels(model_id)
)
